itemDisplayName: Deploy a WindowsServer VM with the Azul Zulu OpenJDK JVM
description: This template allows you to create a WindowsServer VM with the Azul Zulu OpenJDK JVM. The Zulu installation script is pulled from https link on https://github.com/Azure/azure-quickstart-templates/master/101-Windows-Java-ZuluOpenJDK/scripts/zulu-install.sh
summary: Deploy a WindowsServer VM with the Azul Zulu OpenJDK JVM
